item.title: 纽约市交通拥堵定价获得公交委员会的关键批准
item.description: 纽约市大都会交通管理局批准了全国首个交通拥堵收费计划，该计划最快将于 6 月中旬开始实施，在此之前，纽约市的司机们距离支付进入曼哈顿中央商务区的新费用越来越近了。【原文：Drivers in New York City inched closer to paying a new fee to enter Manhattan’s central business district after the Metropolitan Transportation Authority approved the nation’s first congestion-pricing plan, which could begin as soon as mid-June.】

item.title: DHL 高管表示巴尔的摩港可能在六周内重新开放
item.description: 据一位物流主管称，巴尔的摩港可能会在 5 月份重新开放，因为周二早些时候摧毁弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥的船只上的货物将面临长时间的延误。【原文：The Port of Baltimore could reopen in May, according to a logistics executive who has cargo facing long delays aboard the ship that destroyed the Francis Scott Key Bridge early Tuesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥比索创九年新高，套利交易未受影响
item.description: 在高利率、低波动性和充足流动性的共同推动下，墨西哥比索周三升至近九年来的最高点。【原文：Mexico’s peso rose to the highest in almost nine years Wednesday, driven by a combination of high interest rates, low volatility and ample liquidity.】

item.title: 油轮将更多俄罗斯柴油运往供应过剩的巴西
item.description: 满载着数百万桶俄罗斯柴油的油轮正漂浮在巴西海岸线上，更多的柴油即将抵达。【原文：Tankers laden with millions of barrels of Russian diesel are floating off the coast of Brazil — with more on the way.】

item.title: 红迪网被对冲基金列为 "空头"，暴跌 50
item.description: Reddit Inc.股价有望创下这家社交媒体公司上市交易以来的最大单日跌幅。此前，Hedgeye 风险管理公司发布报告，将其列为做空品种，并称其交易价格应比当前水平低约 50%。【原文：Reddit Inc. shares are on track to notch their largest one-day drop since the social media company’s trading debut after Hedgeye Risk Management released a report adding it as a short idea and saying it should trade about 50% below current levels.】

item.title: 瑞士考虑提高增值税，增加养老金缴费
item.description: 瑞士政府正在考虑增加从工资中扣除的强制性缴款，并提高增值税，以便为本月公民投票通过的养老金增长提供资金。【原文：Switzerland’s government is considering increasing mandatory contributions deducted from wages and raising the value-added tax to fund the increase in pensions citizens voted through this month.】

item.title: 莫桑比克成为非洲首个在 2024 年两次下调利率的国家
item.description: 在消费者通胀率降至近四年来的最低点之后，莫桑比克央行成为今年非洲第一个在连续几次会议上降低基准贷款利率的国家。【原文：Mozambique’s central bank became the first in Africa this year to reduce its benchmark lending rate at successive meetings, after consumer inflation slowed to an almost four-year low.】

item.title: 房贷利率居高不下，住房债券销售创十年新高
item.description: 今年到目前为止，州政府和地方政府为经济适用房借贷了近 90 亿美元，是至少十年来借贷最多的一年。【原文：State and local governments borrowed nearly $9 billion for affordable housing so far this year — the most for the period in at least a decade — as buying a home in the US remains expensive.】

item.title: 颠覆经济学的心理学家丹尼尔-卡尼曼逝世，享年90岁
item.description: 心理学家丹尼尔-卡尼曼（Daniel Kahneman）逝世，他的研究使人们对决策的合理性产生了怀疑，帮助催生了行为经济学领域，并为他赢得了诺贝尔奖。享年90岁。【原文：Daniel Kahneman, a psychologist whose work casting doubt on the rationality of decision-making helped spawn the field of behavioral economics and won him a Nobel Prize, has died. He was 90.】

item.title: 研究称，诺和诺德生产的价值 1,000 美元的糖尿病药物 Ozempic 每月成本不到 5 美元
item.description: 据一项研究称，Ozempic的生产成本可能低于每月5美元，即使生产商诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）在美国的收费接近1,000美元，也能从中获利，该研究再次引发了人们对最畅销的糖尿病和肥胖症治疗药物价格的质疑。【原文：Ozempic could be profitably produced for less than $5 a month even as maker Novo Nordisk A/S charges almost $1,000 in the US, according to a study that revives questions about prices for top-selling treatments for diabetes and obesity.】

item.title: 意大利财政部长表示意大利将暂时保留 51% 的邮政股份
item.description: 意大利财政部长吉安卡洛-乔盖蒂（Giancarlo Giorgetti）周三表示，意大利政府将分阶段出售意大利邮政股份公司（Poste Italiane SpA），国家最初可能会保留 51%的股份，而不是立即将持股比例降至计划的 35%。【原文：The Italian government’s sale of Poste Italiane SpA will occur in phases and the state will likely retain 51% initially instead of reducing its holding to the planned 35% right away, Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 桥梁灾难后，输油管道为巴尔的摩输油管道预留空间
item.description: 美国最大的燃料管道系统--殖民地管道公司（Colonial Pipeline）正在对通往巴尔的摩的一条小管道进行空间配给，这一不同寻常的举动表明，在一座重要桥梁坍塌后，需求已经超过了容量。【原文：Colonial Pipeline, the largest fuel pipeline system in the US, is rationing space on a small line to Baltimore in an unusual move that signals demand is exceeding capacity after a vital bridge collapsed.】

item.title: 贝莱德因 ESG 战略被密西西比州发出法律警告
item.description: 在密西西比州官员指控贝莱德投资公司就其气候战略发表 "欺诈性 "声明后，贝莱德公司面临被禁止在密西西比州发行证券的前景。【原文：BlackRock Inc. faces the prospect of being barred from offering securities in Mississippi after state officials accused the investment firm of making “fraudulent” statements regarding its climate strategy.】

item.title: 养老基金将为能源转型购买更多基础设施
item.description: 根据 IFM Investors 的一份报告，全球养老基金在基础设施方面的投资严重不足，随着他们将更多资金投入到将成为全球能源转型一部分的资产中，将有助于推动经济增长。【原文：Pension funds around the world are significantly underinvested in infrastructure and will help drive growth as they tip more capital into assets that will be part of the global energy transition, according to a report by IFM Investors.】

item.title: 法官裁定美国证券交易委员会对 Coinbase 的诉讼可以继续进行
item.description: 根据美国法律，一名法官裁定 Coinbase 公司从事 "未注册的证券销售和发售"，允许证券交易委员会对该公司提起诉讼。【原文：A judge ruled that Coinbase Inc. engages in the “unregistered sale and offer of securities” under US law, allowing a lawsuit by the Securities and Exchange Commission to go forward against the company.】

item.title: 三家人工智能加密货币公司达成合并代币协议
item.description: 三家在区块链上运营的人工智能公司已同意合并它们的加密代币，此举旨在帮助它们开发一个去中心化的人工智能平台。【原文：Three artificial intelligence companies that operate on blockchain have agreed to merge their crypto tokens, a move aimed at helping them develop a decentralized AI platform.】

item.title: 美国财政部警告：人工智能使金融欺诈变得更容易、更复杂

item.title: 埃及和巴基斯坦等待新兴市场降级威胁的裁决
item.description: 失去新兴市场地位的威胁笼罩着埃及和巴基斯坦，这两个国家将在周三了解其经济扭转计划是否足以避免在富时罗素（FTSE Russell）被降级。越南正在等待难以实现的晋升。【原文：The threat of losing their emerging-market status hangs over Egypt and Pakistan, which will learn on Wednesday whether their economic-turnaround plans are enough to avoid demotion at FTSE Russell. Vietnam is awaiting an elusive promotion.】

item.title: 乌克兰试图向天然气贸易商保证其储气库的安全
item.description: 乌克兰正试图向欧洲天然气贸易商保证，在遭到俄罗斯袭击后，在该国庞大的地下设施中储存天然气燃料仍然是安全的。【原文：Ukraine is seeking to reassure European natural gas traders that it’s still safe to store the fuel in the country’s vast underground facilities after a Russian attack.】

item.title: 伦敦保险公司面临巴尔的摩大桥价值数十亿美元的赔款
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）分析师表示，周二巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥倒塌后，保险公司面临高达 30 亿美元的索赔，其中伦敦劳合社市场上的公司面临的风险最大。【原文：Insurers face claims of as much as $3 billion following Tuesday’s collapse of the Francis Scott Key Bridge in Baltimore, with firms on the Lloyd’s of London market most exposed, Barclays Plc analysts said.】

item.title: 印度将在大选前出售更少债券，指数将被纳入
item.description: 随着决策者在大选前控制支出并将国家债务纳入全球指数，印度出售的债券数量将少于预期。【原文：India will sell fewer bonds than estimated as policymakers rein in spending ahead of elections and inclusion of the nation’s debt in global indexes.】

item.title: 拜登推动生物燃料有可能取代玉米成为美国作物之王
item.description: 2024 年，美国农民种植的玉米将超过大豆；一个多世纪以来，大多数年份都是如此。但除此之外，绿色柴油的蓬勃发展有可能会取代作物之王的地位。【原文：American farmers will plant more corn than soybeans in 2024 — as they have in most years for over a century. But beyond that, a green diesel boom threatens to dethrone the king of all crops.】
